title: Online Audiometer
description: Professional hearing test with interactive audiogram and interpretation
instructionsText: Click the ▶ button on a cell to play a tone. After hearing it, mark it as ✓ (heard) or ✗ (not heard). Work from quietest to loudest volumes to find your hearing threshold.
testResultsDesc: Complete the hearing test above to see your results
chartDescription: Your hearing threshold at different frequencies. The lower the line, the better your hearing at that frequency.
chartHowToRead: How to read it: Each point shows the quietest volume (in dB) where you could hear the tone. Lower dB values = better hearing.
downloadResultsDesc: Your comprehensive audiogram report has been saved
resultsClearedDesc: All test markers have been removed
testIncompleteDesc: Please complete testing all {{total}} frequencies before downloading. You have tested {{completed}} of {{total}}.
calibrationCompleteDesc: Your audiometer is now calibrated for accurate testing
startTestingInstructions: Start testing by clicking the ▶ Play button on cells. When you hear a sound, click the ✓ Heard button to mark it. Your hearing threshold will appear here automatically.
